metadata.description:
i wrote this one last year in LA - at the time i was stuck in an endless cycle of arguments with someone i was seeing, and eventually realized the easiest way through was to just apologize for a bunch of things i didn’t do. 

it smoothed things over in the moment lol but afterwards it really wasn’t sitting right with me, and i was carrying around a lot of regret for not standing my ground more. i had a session with sam affer & jae lee a few days later and wrote this hook

i hope none of you relate with this experience lol but if you do, don’t ever apologize for shit you didn’t do!!!

thennnn to meet deadline for my EP (which eventually got postponed anyway lol) i went to pirate studios in silverlake and wrote the verses / produced the entire hook in a day.

i tend to agonize over production choices / lyrics etc - i revisit my WIPs a lot - so being forced to make choices and commit to my initial ideas for this one was ultimately a really rewarding and new thing for me.

took a lot for me to settle on this final version, and sonically this is a big new jump for me, so i hope you love it as much as i do. xx

lyrics.text:
my bad i lost myself
you told me you do too
i told you i can't tell
you know i'd walk through hell
just to be close to you
i'm stuck under your spell, ok

cause i used to be different
back when i was living
and not just existing
just watching the time go by
now you and i
just can't see eye to eye
and you don't apologize, so
guess i'll say

my bad i'm sick
my bad i'm lit
i can't commit
i'm full of shit
i tried my best
we made a mess
can't pass your tests
my bad, my bad

my bad baby i'm on one
yeah i was lit when i called ya
ain't never meant to involve ya
in this chaos of mine
my bad baby i'm tweaking
i'm hearing you but you reaching
and i'm all caught up with my demons
i need you on my side

cause you live in my head uninvited
and i give you my whole undivided
attention and love
but it's never enough
and it's crazy because
i let you know from the jump
but again

my bad i'm sick
my bad i'm lit
i can't commit
i'm full of shit
i tried my best
we made a mess
can't pass your tests
my bad, my bad

metadata.name: my bad... #1
metadata.title: my bad...
